title: Did the American Minister of Education, Betsy Davis, announce his plans to cut $18 million to fund the Special Olympics?

vclaim: In March 2019, American Minister of Education Betsy Davos proposed the cancellation of a grant of approximately $18 million for special Olympic programmes.
